title: From Seiberg-Witten invariants to topological Green-Schwarz string
abstract: In this note we describe the physics of equivalence of the Seiberg-Witten invariants of 4-manifolds and certain Gromov-Witten invariants defined by pseudo-holomorphic curves. We show that physics of the pseudo-holomorphic curves should be governed by the N=2 Green-Schwarz string.
